messages.content: I love Lancaster. I live here and am delighted to be raising my family here. I use our local public services just like you – it is important that your local MP is just that, local. Lancaster matters to me because this is my home too. With your support, I can continue to serve our city and work for the real change our country needs.

community.content: I live here and am delighted to be raising my family here. I use our local public services just like you – it is important that your local MP is just that, local.
